sense.def:
To salvage things
pomeni, da nam uspe rešiti stvari, na primer z ladje, ki se je potopila, ali iz stavbe, ki se je porušila.

seg.quote: ...a finely decorated window salvaged from an old chemist's shop.

sense.def:
The salvage
so stvari, ki jih nekomu uspe rešiti z nasedle ladje ali iz porušene stavbe.

seg.quote: The insurers are entitled to take the wreck as salvage.

sense.def:
To salvage something from a difficult situation
pomeni, da nekomu uspe iz težavnega položaja dobiti nekaj koristnega, tako da vse skupaj ni popoln polom zanj.

seg.quote: They were salvaging what they could from the present unhappy state of affairs.
